ConfigurationOption.Value: select m.itemnum, m.description, m.linetype, m.quantity, m.unitcost, iv.issueunit, m.issuetype, it.lottype, m.storeloc, m.binnum, m.lotnum, m.conditioncode, m.curbal, m.issueto, m.refwo, m.assetnum, m.location, m.glcreditacct, m.gldebitacct, m.enterby, m.transdate, ( -1 * ( m.quantity + coalesce( ( select sum(m2.quantity) from matusetrans m2 where m2.issueid = m.matusetransid ), 0 ) ) ) outstanding, m.siteid, m.orgid, m.issueid, m.matusetransid, iv.inventoryid, wo.workorderid from matusetrans m left join item it on m.itemnum = it.itemnum and m.itemsetid = it.itemsetid left join inventory iv on m.itemnum = iv.itemnum and m.storeloc = iv.location and m.orgid = 'LBNL' and m.siteid = 'FAC' and m.siteid = iv.siteid and m.orgid = iv.orgid left join workorder wo on m.refwo = wo.wonum and m.siteid = wo.siteid where m.orgid = 'LBNL' and m.siteid = 'FAC' and m.linetype in ( 'ITEM', 'MATERIAL' )
-1 * ( m.quantity + coalesce( ( select sum(m2.quantity) from matusetrans m2 where m2.issueid = m.matusetransid ), 0 ) )
-1 * ( m.quantity + coalesce( ( select sum(m2.quantity) from matusetrans m2 where m2.issueid = m.matusetransid ), 0 ) )

Struct._value: := test( nvl( ${DS_PARENT_VIEW}, 'NONE' ) == 'Issues and Returns', localQuery( 'Issues and Returns', ${1}, 'issuegroupid = ${issuegroupid}' ), localQuery( 'Work Orders', ${1}, ' workorderid = ${workorderid}' ) )

ViewField.Name: Quantity
ViewField.Default: := eval( IsInsert(), 1, test( ${Original Quantity} is not null and ${Original Quantity} < 0, -1.0 * ${Original Quantity}, ${Original Quantity} ) )

Struct._value: := test(nvl(${Work Order}) is null or ${Issue Type} = 'RETURN', true, false)

EventAction.Condition: ${Item} is not null and nvl( ${LOOKUP_ID} ) is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: The specified item was not found in the current storeroom

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ( nvl( ${Quantity} ) is null or nvl( ${Quantity} ) <=0 )

ConfigurationOption.Value: Invalid Quantity - Quantity must be greater than zero.
The specified quantity is very large (${Quantity}). Is this value correct?

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${inventoryid} is null and ${Description} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please select an item or enter the materials description for this transaction.

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${Line Type} = 'MATERIAL' and ${Unit Cost} is null

ConfigurationOption.Value: The Quantity must be greater than zero

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${GL Debit} is null and ${Work Order} is null and ((${Issue Type} = 'ISSUE' and ${Issue To} is null) or ${Issue Type} = 'RETURN')

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please enter Work Order or valid GL Debit Account
:= test(nvl(${Work Order})is null, ${GL Debit}, query("All WOs Lookup", "GL Account", "'Work Order' = ${Work Order}"))
Non-stocked material cannot be issued without specifiying a work order.
The specified item was not found in the current storeroom

EventAction.Condition: IsInsert() and ${Work Order} is not null
nvl(query( "GL Account", "GL Account" , "'GL Account' = ${GL Debit}")) is null

Struct.Condition: !IsPopup() and nvl( parentValue( "Work Order") ) is not null and parentValue( 'Issue Type' ) != 'RETURN'
